attributes.action: Protect Free Speech and our right to criticize Israel without fear of punishment
attributes.additional_details:
Israel calls itself the only true democracy in the middle east. This so-called democracy recently released a 12 year old Palestinian girl from prison, after alleging she was in possession of a knife. Israel also recently made the headlines when an Israeli Soldier shot dead a wounded and unarmed Palestinian who posed no threat.

We have every right to denounce Israel for these crimes, without being labelled anti-semitic. Criticizing Israel is not anti-semitic.
attributes.background: We call on the government to further protect our rights of free speech and our right to criticize Israel without fear of punishment or being labelled anti-semitic. We have every right to be critical of Israel's appalling treatment of the Palestinians in the Occupied Territories.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition which outlines what specific action you would like the UK Government and Parliament to take to protect free speech.
